definition: mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units

sentences.english: AIRSPEED BUGS, Adjustable pointers on the airspeed indicator.
sentences.chinese: 空速游标，空速表上的可调指标。

sentences.english: Note that blocking cursors do pre-fetching.
sentences.chinese: 注意，成块游标要进行预取。

sentences.english: Note that we are using the square brackets to mark the cursor position.
sentences.chinese: 注意一下，我们用中括号来标记目前的游标位置。

sentences.english: For a cursor this is the elapsed time between open and close.
sentences.chinese: 对于游标，这就是打开和关闭游标之间所经过的时间。

sentences.english: For a cursor this is the elapsed time between open and close.
sentences.chinese: 对于游标，这就是打开和关闭游标之间所经过的时间。

sentences.english: You can set the cursor location in a source window.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在来源视窗内设定游标的位置。

sentences.english: Left click to change cursor position.
sentences.chinese: 点击左键以改变游标位置。

sentences.english: Pause the cursor over the front face, and then click when it highlights.
sentences.chinese: 请将游标暂停在正面之上，在它亮显时按一下。

sentences.english: The current position of the insertion cursor in chars.
sentences.chinese: 游标目前的位置，以字元表示。

sentences.english: When you move a cursor, it moves to the token that fits the description.
sentences.chinese: 当您移动游标时，是将它移动到符合要求的标志。

sentences.english: Previously this kind of extraction would require cursors iterating over sections of a string.
sentences.chinese: 以前，这类提取需要游标循环访问字符串的各部分。

sentences.english: Moves the cursor to the location of the error.
sentences.chinese: 将游标移动至错误所在的位置。

sentences.english: Use vernier calliper to measure the length, diameter of nerve root on both sides.
sentences.chinese: 借助游标卡尺测量两侧神经根的长度和直径。

sentences.english: Using vernier calipers, measure the brush length.
sentences.chinese: 使用游标卡尺，测量电刷长度。

sentences.english: The dial calipers apply dial mechanism instead of vernier for readings and can work accurately and rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 带表卡尺是用表式机构代替游标读数，测量准确迅速。

sentences.english: Open the cursors to be returned.

definition: tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
